description: Welcome to the land of Timpanopia, where big bellies are both beautiful and musical!

variants.name: Default
variants.description: Though they are technically cousins, Faizon and Gilbert make the best of big belly brothers. Nothing can tear apart this dynamic duo!

variants.name: Halloween
variants.description: Setting the stage for Faizon to create a ghostly timpani rollâ€”with just two big hands and one massive, pumpkin-sized belly. Cue the ominous music!

variants.name: Dual Hulk
variants.description: Go big and go green! Two green giants, each with double the bulk of a regular Hulk, bellies booming like twin timpani in a thunderous double roll!
